oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On general obligations of Muslims: what to do and how to make the testament in order to reach Paradise.
امدى معلوم اولا كى هر كيمك حق سبحانه وتعالى نك لطفنه وكرمنه... :Incipit
عادت ناسه باقوب ايدنلر اخرتده مسئول اولور غفلت اولنميه تمت. :Colophon
Written in naskh, in one column, 19 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. Text continues in margin of each page. Catchwords.
Glazed light-cream laid paper, boards covered with marbled paper, red leather spine.

With: Dürr-i meknûn (ff. 1v-28r) ; Din ve dünyaya nâfi yirmi üç hikmet (ff. 29v-32r) ; Ma'rūzāt (ff. 37v-50r) ; Kânûnnâme-yi cedide fî-mâ yete'allak bi'l-arâzî (ff. 50r-71v) ; Fetvâlar (ff. 77v-90r) ; Kitāb Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ (ff. 98v-102v).
MS Turk 11. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wills (Islamic law)
Faith (Islam)
Islam--Doctrines
Islamic law--Interpretation and construction
